content.rendered:
Directed by Siddharth Anand.

Written by Aditya Chopra. Shridhar Raghavan. Siddharth Anand. Abbas Tyrewala.

Cast Hrithik Roshan(Major Kabir Dhaliwal). Tiger Shroff(Captain Khalid Rahmani). Vaani Kapoor(Naina Verma). Ashutosh Rana(Colonel Sunil Luthra). Anupriya Goenka(Aditi Nahta). Yash Raaj Singh(Saurabh). Mashhoor Amrohi(Firoze Contractor). Sanjeev Vatsa(Rizwan Iiyasi). Dipannita Sharma(Dr. Mallika Singhal). Soni Razdan(Khalid’s mother). Arif Zakaria(Dr. Utpal Biswas). Amit Gaur(Lieutenant colonel Jimmy Shroff) .Obada Adnan. Imran Ahamed(Saini). Shahbhaz Akthar(Vishal). Najmeddin AlHadad(Rock Thrower). Giorgio Antonini(Raziwan’s Bodyguard). Rajvir Ashar(School Bully 1). Ravi Awana(Basheer Hassib). Madhavi Bhojak(VK Naidu’s Daughter In law). Mohit Chauhan(V.K Naidu). Miguel Cirillo(Dinesh). Keith Dallison(Farid Haqqani). Srikant Dwivedi(Derrick).Anil George. Swaroopa Ghosh(Sherna Patel (as Swaroopa Gosh)). Akdas Hayat(Musician). Bilal Hossein(Prateik). Katrina Kavi(Staffer). Gulnaaz Khan(Jai Jai Shivshankar Dancer). Midhat Ullah Khan(Saeed Addam). Zahir Abbas Khan(Pilot). Anil Khopkar(President). Richard Bhakti Klein(Captain Grotsky (as R. Bhakti Klein)). Jessy Lever(Muthu (as Jessey Lever)). Bhuvnesh Mann(Engineer). Anis Mirza(School Bully 2). Sashreek Mishra(Aditi’s Husband). Leonardo Papa(Naina’s friend). Francesco Patrazzi(Yemen General)

Language Hindi.

Producers Padam Bhushan. Aditya Chopra. Pietro Ciron. Rengarajan Jaiprakash. Francesco Papa. Dhimant Radia. Bharat Rawail. Gurpreet Singh. Navmeet Singh. Amit Tomar.

Production Reverie Entertainment. Yash Raj Films.
